queryData.totalQuery: SELECT count(app.APPLICATION_ID) as count, APPLICATION_ID from AM_APPLICATION app,AM_SUBSCRIBER sub where sub.SUBSCRIBER_ID=app.SUBSCRIBER_ID AND sub.TENANT_ID='{{tenantId}}' group by app.APPLICATION_ID
queryData.weekQuery: SELECT count(app.APPLICATION_ID) as count, APPLICATION_ID from AM_APPLICATION app,AM_SUBSCRIBER sub where sub.SUBSCRIBER_ID=app.SUBSCRIBER_ID AND sub.TENANT_ID='{{tenantId}}' AND app.CREATED_TIME between '{{weekStart}}' AND '{{weekEnd}}' group by app.APPLICATION_ID
